p: In the above discussions, we have highlighted the superparticles that are formed from one type of NPs. Multicomponent NP nanostructures self-assembled from more than one type of NPs represent a new pathway for generating complex active superparticles with multiple functions for various technological applications ( Suh et al., 2009, Bigall et al., 2012, Tan et al., 2016). These multicomponent NP nanostructures not only enhance the size-dependent properties of their individual components but also manifest novel interactions and synergistic properties from the near-field coupling that occurs between neighboring NPs.
